meanings.definition: Attractive or appealing, especially in a memorable way.
meanings.sent1: The catchy jingle stayed in my head all day.
meanings.sent2: The catchy song made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent3: The catchy commercial made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her catchy smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The catchy tune played on repeat in my mind.

meanings.sent1: The catchy slogan stuck in my memory.
meanings.sent2: The catchy logo was instantly familiar.
meanings.sent3: The catchy fact made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His catchy outfit stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The catchy image lingered in my thoughts.
